name: Micro-Riders
description: Welcome to the world of Micro-Riders; this game is being developed by me and its a smaller indie project with some ambitius features i call wishlist. This game is quite inspired by an older game called Re-Volt. The idea is to make an rc race game where levels can be big houses/rooms and or buildings or even exteriors, each of those levels will be explorable with towns and races to find to progress to next map.
